bibl.title: The Reply of Jesus to King Abgar: A Coptic New Testament Apocryphon Reconsidered (P. Mich. Inv. 6213).
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Reedition of P. Mich. Inv. 6213 (= LDAB 108581). - I. Introduction. - II. The Text of P. Mich. Inv. 6213. - III. Function of P. Mich. Inv. 6213. - IV. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
